Some chapter not yet translated, right?

Part 10 (p187), the yuri literature club story could end peacefully. The guy (Sakuma, actually younger, virgin) joined the literature club for the long haired girl (Koko). But a new member (Mizuki, better kisser) steal her away. When he tried to blackmail her with the photo, she even asks him to AirDrop it to her too, it's a nice shot after all. She tried offering him some fun for the photo (although surprised at his size, as she never did it with real male), and they kind of got overboard with it. In the end, Koko saw them, and it's complicated. | The guy probably didn't start with intention to do NTR, he didn't have the chance to say it anyway before Mizuki offered him sex for fun and they ends up having to make up excuse to the girl they like.
